[vc_row el_id=”home” css=”.vc_custom_1682401071427{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1681816186212{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_row_inner el_class=”container”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”200″][vc_column_text]

Support in every phase of IT project and software development

Our experts deliver reliable and error-free systems in IT outsourcing models

[/vc_column_text]Build Your Team With Us[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Previous Next
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
17
years on the market
+
1000
engineers
+
50
worldwide clients
5
delivery centers in EU
+
50
technologies
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”services” css=”.vc_custom_1682409999154{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #f3f7fd !important;}”][vc_column]

SERVICES

Qualified team of IT Engineers

Many years of experience servicing multiple industries and responding to individual client needs have made us a full-service software development company. We reduce the need for a full-time IT team while providing a cost-effective quality service.
  • Team Leasing
  • Managed Team
  • Offshore/Nearshore Delivery centers

Team leasing

The perfect solution for you when
  • you need specific and proven engeeniers
  • you do not want to create an extensive internal IT team
  • you want a fast project implementation without delays caused by lack of resources

Managed Team

You should choose when
  • you want to focus all your resources on your company’s main objectives
  • you want to move responsibility to the IT vendor
  • you do not want to build a dedicated team responsible for a given project/area
  • you want to optimise costs while maintaining high quality and availability of services

Offshore/Nearshore Delivery centers

Decide on this solution when
  • you want to build professional IT engineering teams servicing your entire organization
  • you want to develop several engineering teams as your business needs grow
  • you don’t want to waste time and resources looking for qualified people to join your team
  • you want the best results while maintaining a high quality-to-price ratio
  • confidentiality and data security are important to you

[vc_empty_space height=”50″]

How do we work with IT projects?

When working with our clients, we always focus on complete service, long-term partnerships and ensuring the highest standards of work by developers. This is why our clients can count on the support of a Customer Success Manager, Site Manager and HR Business Partner.

Customer Success Manager

  • Verification of all IT Resources and Development needs
  • Onboarding and building relationships with Engineers and Customers
  • Responsible for Client – Centric approach and attrition level

Site Manager

  • Managing projects portfolio
  • Cooperating with Customer Technical Managers
  • Overseeing projects delivery
  • Keeping SLAs/KPIs
  • First point of contact and escalations

HR Business Partner

  • Supporting HR matters: people development, motivation, feedback, talent development
  • Onboarding and implementation processes
  • Driving and supporting company culture and values
  • Sharing best practices and experience through proactive self-development

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”need-help”][vc_column]
NEED HELP?

Choose to work with a trustworthy outsourcing IT partner who understands your company's requirements

Get a Price Sheet
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”whywe” css=”.vc_custom_1681888997582{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;}”][vc_column]

WHY CHOOSE US

We provide outsourced IT & cloud services for your business

Scaling up / scaling down

We adapt to your current business needs. We have no problem augmenting our team with highly qualified specialists.

Prime vendor

Your project will be handled by IT experts employed by us. We are not dependent on subcontractors.

Engineers’ mobility

You have the opportunity to actually get to know the engineers you work with. Engineers enjoy participating in business trips to clients abroad.

Tech department

The team working for you has regular contact with technology leaders and IT directors. As a result, they know how to solve the most difficult tasks.

Increasing competences

We offer complimentary training for dedicated employees, because we believe in investing in our team and delivering exceptional value to our clients. As a result, we provide services of the highest quality.

Low turnover

We were awarded the best IT workplace in Poland 5 times. We build lasting relationships with our people and create conditions for their growth. As a result, our team is made up of long-term employees.

“Buddy cooperation”

The mid-developer working for you always has the support of a senior specialist who ensures the quality and outcome of the IT project.

Anti-lock agreement

We play fair. We do not make you dependent. If you decide to stop working with us, you can always do so, and if necessary, we will facilitate data transfer.

In-house compliance department

Our compliance department ensures that the developers working for you comply with both external and internal regulations. It also identifies risks and gives advice on how to avoid or remedy them. It guards data security, among other things, in accordance with current GDPR regulations.

High quality and cost optimisation

Nearshoring to Poland guarantees good prices and goes hand in hand with the high quality of the services offered. We have an impressive pool of talented programmers in our team. They help in improving efficiency and saving time for in-house employees and help deliver projects faster.

Knowledge Harvest

We have built an internal process where we capture and record the tacit knowledge and experience of IT team members to help others adapt and apply it. This enables us to manage changes and minimise the risk of errors. At the same time, we increase the efficiency of project work at clients.

Allocation Center

A dedicated team is responsible for the efficient management of our specialists' work, according to their competencies and client requirements. Your project will be handled by experienced IT engineers. You will not see any disruption or lack of resources in your project.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1681900643526{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-color: #f3f7fd !important;}” el_id=”clients”][vc_column]

CLIENTS

Trusted IT partner of leading companies

We implement processes in outsourcing models, nearshoring, offshoring, staff augmentation for Polish and foreign brands from many demanding industries – financial, banking, education, energy or insurance. We have also been successfully implementing projects for the public sector for many years.
[vc_empty_space height=”50px”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sayAboutUs” css=”.vc_custom_1681903221868{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;}”][vc_column]

TESTIMONIALS

What people say about working with us

[vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aEERXgx9qH4″ align=”center” el_class=”container”]
I am seeing Britenet’s support on a daily basis, making sure that the team is fully engaged, fully focused and fully delivers what we’re aiming to achieve.
Lior Shemo
VP R&D, Driivz
Our relationship with them is not a customer and consultant relationship. Britenet is part of our family.
Anuj Kapoor
Senior Project Director, EF Education First
The concept of how you operate your company, how Britenet is recruiting people, retaining people and delivering the services from various centers was the convincing factor to choose Britenet.
Jorg Koletzki
Chief Information Officer, AerCap Holdings N.V.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”technologies” css=”.vc_custom_1682323606025{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-color: #f3f7fd !important;}”][vc_column]

Areas of technology in cloud platforms, backend and frontend development

We are experts in .NET, JAVA, Salesforce, UX & FRONTEND technologies, but that's not all. We can carry out a variety of projects, depending on your expectations.
  • Backend & Cloud
  • Salesforce
  • Frontend
  • Quality Assurance
  • User Experience
  • Bussines Intelligence
Amazon Web Service
Azure
Java
Google Cloud Platform
Python
.NET
MuleSoft
Salesforce
Salesforce Community Cloud
Salesforce Service Cloud
Angular
NodeJS
React
TypeScript
Cypress
Apache JMeter
Selenium
Adobe Xd
Figma
Framer
Hotjar
Azure
Power BI
Tableau
[vc_single_image image=”375″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1682578730002{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”people” css=”.vc_custom_1682323611508{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;}”][vc_column]

OUR TEAM

Meet Britenet Community

At Britenet, the development of our clients and employees is our top priority. In the IT industry, our employees need to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and solutions, which is why we provide them with excellent conditions for developing their competencies. We employ experienced workers in our team who have been working with us for a long time. This ensures that our clients can be certain that they are collaborating with people who possess rich experience and knowledge.

I am glad to have been part of Britenet for 9 years. During my years in the company I have had the opportunity to work with clients in the retail or trucking industry. I am currently engaged in a project closely related to the aviation industry. I value the high level of comfort in working with clients.

Robert Kwapiszewski

Microsoft Manager

International projects and a good customer approach is what I appreciate the most. My career at Britenet began about 13 years ago and I am proud to contribute to the history of the company. The projects I had worked on had been related to the insurance and automotive industry. Now I work with a client from the banking area.

Karol Chomik

Java Manager

Since I have started my work at the company, I have managed to come into contact with clients from the financial and construction sectors. When I began my work at Britenet, 4 years ago, I did not expect to be a part of so many projects for well known companies. The aerospace industry is the branch I currently work for.

Jakub Kątny

Salesforce Leader

The variety of projects at Britenet can be seen from my work with the company for almost 7 years. During my career here I had worked for clients in the field of gaming or paper product companies. Currently I am successfully delivering projects for some of the largest organizations in the aviation industry.

Piotr Wegner

Technology Manager

My 12 years at Britenet taught me that a good customer relationship is a very important aspect of the IT industry. I am currently working on a project for a key client in the aviation industry. In the past I cooperated with manufacturing companies and educational institutions.

Daniel Wójcikowski

Support & Maintenance Manager

As an HR Business Partner, I work with both clients and IT professionals. My role is to take care of the relationship of both sides during the service delivery journey. I have had the opportunity to be involved in many interesting and international projects during my 2+ years at Britenet. At the end of the previous year, I have been able to join a team that is working with a leading aerospace company.

Beata Bednarek

HR BP & IT Recruitment Leader

I am a huge fan of Salesforce solutions and cloud computing, which is why I hold the role of Salesforce Manager. I have been working at Britenet for 14 years now and have successfully developed my professional competence in international projects. One of the many areas I worked in is the education industry. My long-term experience in the company has given me extensive experience in working with foreign clients.

Adam Siwek

Salesforce Manager
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”contact” css=”.vc_custom_1682323621480{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-color: #f3f7fd !important;}”][vc_column]

GET IN TOUCH

Build your team of IT specialists with us

I'd love to hear from you. Please provide me with your preferred contact method so I can be sure to reach you.
[vc_row_inner el_class=”container”][vc_column_inner el_class=”contact-area” width=”1/2″]





    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”space-mobile-top” width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”398″ img_size=”300×300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_circle_2″][vc_column_text el_class=”no-margin-bottom”]

    Michał Tomasik

    Director of Enterprise & Nearshoring Services
    +48 501 453 149
    michal.tomasik@britenet.eu

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
